message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $7,500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $6,800. Is that something you'd be willing to consider?
I understand you're looking to get a good deal, Bob! I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can offer you the product for $7,200. It's a fair price considering the product's value.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above that. I'm thinking more along the lines of $6,500. Can you do any better than that?
I understand you're still looking for a better deal, Bob! I'm willing to compromise a bit more. I can offer you the product for $7,000. It's the best I can do, but I think it's still a great value.
I'm getting close to my target, but I'm still not quite there. I'm thinking more along the lines of $6,200. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand you're really close to your target, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can offer you the product for $6,800. It's the lowest I can go, but I think it's still a fair price.
I'm really close to my target, and I think we're almost there. I'm willing to meet you at $6,500. Can you do that for me?
